name: The Dark Memories of A Blind Past - Windows Build
name_original: The Dark Memories of A Blind Past - Windows Build
description:
Hello everyone! 

I'm Doüg!

This is my first game published here, I hope you like it. I made it for the B&W Jam .... and the optional theme was:

You only realize the value of something when it's gone ...

And I chose to address this theme by dealing in the game with diseases of the mind in older people .... dementia, madness, insanity, hallucinations, depression, etc ...

My biggest inspiration for this game were two characters from two of my favorite Netflix series - Reznikov Galina from Orange is The New Black and Soledad Nunes from Vis a Vis

All this with a character that manages to bring something friendly and a soundtrack made with great care for the game.

I am a Brazilian solo developer and also an independent visual artist. 

PS: Some bugs will be fixed later, like collectors, etc ...

In advance I will improve the game to publish on Google PlayStore and Steam

If you want to support the project to go even further, feel free to give support, and also suggestions.

Visual Art and Development:

Doüg Mattos - Kamo Art Studio and Sid Games

Intro Music and Boss Music by: OldWoodStudios - OddSheep

Additional music and sound effects provided by:

https://www.zapsplat.com/

Thank you and enjoy!
